程序包 com.cs2212group9.typinggame.db.tests

类 TestDBLevel

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212group9.typinggame.db.tests.TestDBLevel
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class TestDBLevel extends Object
Provides a set of unit tests for the DBLevel class to verify its functionality in managing game levels within the database. It includes tests for level properties retrieval and handling of invalid data.

    说明

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    static void
    setup()
    Prepares the testing environment by setting up the levels table in the database and inserting initial test data.
    void
    testGetLevelDifficulty()
    Verifies the correct retrieval of a level's difficulty setting from the database.
    void
    testGetLevelWaves()
    Confirms accurate retrieval of the number of waves for a given level.
    void
    TestGetLevelWords1()
    Ensures the correct number of words are returned for a specified level, validating the words retrieval process.
    void
    TestGetLevelWords2()
    Similar to the previous test but for a different level, ensuring consistency in words retrieval functionality.
    void
    testInvalidLevelDifficulty()
    Validates handling of invalid level IDs when querying level difficulty, expecting a default or error value.
    void
    testInvalidLevelWaves()
    Checks the behavior of querying waves for non-existent levels, expecting a default or error response.
    void
    TestLevelCount()
    Tests the accurate count of levels available in the database.

    • TestDBLevel

      public TestDBLevel()

  • 方法详细资料

    • setup

      @BeforeAll public static void setup()
      Prepares the testing environment by setting up the levels table in the database and inserting initial test data. This method is run once before all test methods to ensure a consistent starting state.

    • testGetLevelDifficulty

      @Test @Order(1) public void testGetLevelDifficulty()
      Verifies the correct retrieval of a level's difficulty setting from the database.

    • testGetLevelWaves

      @Test @Order(2) public void testGetLevelWaves()
      Confirms accurate retrieval of the number of waves for a given level.

    • testInvalidLevelDifficulty

      @Test @Order(3) public void testInvalidLevelDifficulty()
      Validates handling of invalid level IDs when querying level difficulty, expecting a default or error value.

    • testInvalidLevelWaves

      @Test @Order(4) public void testInvalidLevelWaves()
      Checks the behavior of querying waves for non-existent levels, expecting a default or error response.

    • TestLevelCount

      @Test @Order(5) public void TestLevelCount()
      Tests the accurate count of levels available in the database.

    • TestGetLevelWords1

      @Test @Order(6) public void TestGetLevelWords1()
      Ensures the correct number of words are returned for a specified level, validating the words retrieval process.

    • TestGetLevelWords2

      @Test @Order(7) public void TestGetLevelWords2()
      Similar to the previous test but for a different level, ensuring consistency in words retrieval functionality.
